body: it's not really "nDimI indices and nDimV values", it's more like "self has nDimI sparse dimensions and nDimV dense dimensions". For (nDimI, nDimV) = (2, 0), this translates to "self has 2 sparse dimensions and 0 dense dimensions" (so self is a sparse 2D tensor).

body_text: it's not really "nDimI indices and nDimV values", it's more like "self has nDimI sparse dimensions and nDimV dense dimensions". For (nDimI, nDimV) = (2, 0), this translates to "self has 2 sparse dimensions and 0 dense dimensions" (so self is a sparse 2D tensor).
